phdl.designer
Class PHDLDesign

java.lang.Object
  phdl.designer.PHDLDesign

public class PHDLDesign
extends java.lang.Object

A class that models a design schematic for a PCB. A top module class that contains the design name, a set of devices on the board, a set of device instances, and a set of nets

Version:
0.1
Author:
Richard Black and Brad Riching

isValidDRC

public boolean isValidDRC()
Still to be implemented. It will compile a complete netlist and check the pins to make sure that, i.e. no two outputs are immediately tied together.

Returns:
true if DRC passes, false, otherwise
